    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot(double wheelDiameter,
     double trackWidth,
     boolean reverse,
     double rotationSpeed,
     double translationMagnitude,
     double rotationMagnitude)
        Parameters:
        wheelDiameter - Diameter of the tires in mm
        trackWidth - Distance between center of right tire and center of left tire in mm
        reverse - If true, the NXT robot moves forward when the motors are running backward
        rotationSpeed - Rotation speed of the vehicle, in degrees per second
        translationMagnitude - Magnitude of translation in mm of methods translateForward() and translateBackward()
        rotationMagnitude - Magnitude of rotation in degrees of methods rotateRight() and rotateLeft()
